data.title: Super 8 by Wyndham Woodburn, Woodburn (updated prices 2024)
data.meta_description: This Woodburn hotel offers spacious rooms equipped with flat-screen HD cable TV and free Wi-Fi.
data.text:
Super 8 by Wyndham Woodburn is situated in Woodburn, within 47 km of South Waterfront City Park and 47 km of Governor Tom McCall Waterfront Park. With a garden, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. The rooms at Super 8 by Wyndham Woodburn are fitted with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Portland Art Museum is 48 km from the accommodation, while Portland State University is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Portland International Airport, 61 km from Super 8 by Wyndham Woodburn.

Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.0 for a two-person trip.

Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.

A damage deposit of US$200 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
